name: Zuzumber_Wars
description:
Download instructions:   
1) click the DOWNLOAD button under the file you need.   
2) at the bottom you will see a notification 
that the project is downloading,
click on the project in the DOWNLOADS folder   
3) enjoy the game  
HOW TO PLAY:  
1) w-forward  
2) s - back  
3) d - right  
4) a - left  
5) Shift + movement button - run  
6) Space - jump  
7) esc - open menu  
8) click the right mouse button - aiming  
9) click the left mouse button - shooting  
10) holding down the right mouse button + clicking 
the left mouse button - shooting in aiming mode  
The essence of the game is that you are
 in a maze with 20 zombie cucumbers (zuzumbers) 
your task is to survive and eliminate all the zuzumbers 
(they have glowing eyes and are easy to spot).  
GOOD GAME!!! 
The game was released by the 
New World studio worked on it: 
NobodyHere - music https://www.youtube.com/c/NobodyHere539
Lakamfo - thanks to him I got a plot and mechanics  - https://www.youtube.com/c/Lakamfo
and of course the creator of the game itself - Maxim. 
Best regards, studio Nw
